#How to setup Vinaora Cu3er 3D Slideshow
=How to turn on demo=

  * Firstly, open Joomla! Back-end (Joomla! Administrator page).
  * And then, go to *"Extensions"* menu >> *"Module Manager"* >> choose *"Vinaora Cu3er 3D SlideShow"* module.
  * See *Parameters* section on the right hand.
  * Go to *Global Settings* >> *Custom Config* parameter and choose one configuration from the list.
  * Enabled the module and press *`[Apply]`* or *`[Save]`* button
  * Go to front-end to see the result.

http://farm3.static.flickr.com/2739/4405642765_f039322361_o.png

=How to turn off demo and setup by yourself=

  * Go to *Global Settings* >> *Custom Config* parameter and choose *'--None selected--'*.
  * Don't touch *"Config Name"* parameter
  * Press *`[Apply]`* or *`[Save]`* button

=How to add more images=

===Go to "Slide/Image Settings" section===

Please keep mind: To enter more than one item in these parameters, separate each item by a vertical bar ' | '.

Example: 

{{{
value 1 | value 2 | value 3 | value 4
}}}

If a value is not exist, such as "value 3" = none, please leave a blank. Example:

{{{
value 1 | value 2 |  | value 4
}}}

==="URL(s) Image" Parameter: Path to your image(s)===

Example: if you have 5 images in folder *"media/mod_vinaora_cu3er/images/demo1/"*, please input:

{{{
media/mod_vinaora_cu3er/images/demo1/slide_1.jpg | media/mod_vinaora_cu3er/images/demo1/slide_2.jpg | media/mod_vinaora_cu3er/images/demo1/slide_3.jpg | media/mod_vinaora_cu3er/images/demo1/slide_4.jpg | media/mod_vinaora_cu3er/images/demo1/slide_5.jpg
}}}

==="Link(s) to" Parameter: Link to the page or site when the user clicks the slide===

Please input links correspond with 5 images above

{{{
http://vinaora.com | http://vinaora.net | http://vinaora.org | http://vinaora.info | http://joomla.org
}}}

==="Link(s) Target" Parameter: Where the linked document will be opened: '_blank', '_self', '_parent', '_top'===

Please input targets correspond with 5 images above

{{{
_blank | _blank | _top | _top | _parent
}}}

Description(s) Box Parameter: If you want to show Description box, please choose "Yes"

===Heading(s):===

{{{
heading 1 | heading 2 | heading 3 | heading 4 | heading 5
}}}

...
